case.state: H-hang on! That's a demon!
Kaz Kaan. Neo Yokio's premier man of elegance. It's nice to meet you.
Kaz Kaan. Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor and demon slayer. Pleased to meet you.
I'm usually fashionably late to these things. Are we... waiting for more people still?
So, do we wait for more people or is this it?
Oh, guess I'm a bit early. Is this everyone?
Looks like we're going to have a bit of a crowd to~background.time~.
Honestly, I'd feel kind of weird if it was just three people playing.
Hmm hm hmmm...
Nothing like a full table to witness my victory!
It's gonna be lively with this many people. Guess that's what I'm here for.
The more the merrier, as they say. Think there's still room for my boys, Lexi and Gottlieb? Guess not.
Uh... so... ~player~... I take it you... like bugs?
So we're just... ignoring the talking butterfly?
So we're just... ignoring the talking firefly?
I'll warn you all, this isn't my first time playing strip poker. I've been to my fair share of ragers out in the Hamptons.
Embarrassment is temporary, but seeing people in their underwear is forever.
Don't be intimidated by my status as Neo Yokio's number one bachelor. Or maybe be intimidated. You're free to make your own decisions.
Ah-hem!
Let's go with ~cards.text~ and see what that brings me.
Hmm, I guess I need to exchange ~cards.ifPlural(these|this one)~ to have a chance.
Let me exchange ~cards.text~, please.
Man, it's not like me to have a good turn. Maybe luck is a lady.
This isn't going to be much fun if the cards make it this easy for me.
Maybe I should have Charles get some champagne to celebrate my victory...
This place has some nice vibes. Eclectic, busy, kind of like home.
Not all luck goes sour, right? Sometimes things do work out... right? I am... seriously asking.
Okay... this seems good... but things aren't always as they seem.
Dangit, got to keep my head in the game. I didn't even realize what I had there...
So, my stock is high right now, right? I'm not misreading the room... or being tricked?
I'm feeling quite elegant to~background.time~ and it's all because of this lovely company.
Absolutely feeling this to~background.time~. Man, it was not a mistake hanging out with you guys.
Alright, when you see my cards just remember it's not a competition. Well, obviously this game is, but life isn't! Let's just be present here, you know?
No matter how this turns out, this was definitely a Kaz Kaan table. It's undeniable.
These are great cards, but somehow I don't feel very safe...
Focus Kaz. Remember your training... not that you've ever had any training.
So... weird vibes tonight... right?
Just play the game Kaz. Don't get distracted by strange thoughts.
Shining hope gives way to darkest despair. Luck is an illusion cast by a vengeful and wack god...
Why does lady luck taunt me with good fortune? She should cut me free, to fall into a pit of depravity and major embarrassment.
Whatever...
Why am I even trying? There's obviously a cosmic plot to keep me in a state of eternal wackness...
Wonder how this is gonna turn out...
Charles, could you-- oh, right. No Charles here.
It's not very elegant to try too hard to win...
Yes, more vibes please...
I've a bit of a weakness for a pretty face. Don't think I don't know that might backfire in this sort of context.
C'mon, Kaz, focus up. Don't let them get your head all foggy...
Eh, this will be good enough. I'm kinda feeling myself right now anyways.
It's not going so bad, right? I can probably afford a slip up or two...
A small blessing. A piece of driftwood in an endless ocean. This is better than I deserve, honestly.
Drat. Well, this isn't so bad. I guess it's possible that maybe I still might lose this hand somehow.
It will be what it will be. Who am I to struggle against fate? Against the gods, if there be gods that set fate against a mortal like me.
Would it be so bad just to stop trying? To give up and consign myself to my cringe-worthy fate?
Why concern myself with luck? It's out of my hands. An unknowable fate is exciting.
Win or lose, we're all still having fun, right?
Even if I can't win, it was just nice to be able to chill with such an excellent crowd.
Can we keep the good times rolling? Even if just for a bit of extra time? Maybe we could work it out.
I can't focus with all these weird vibes?
Something is throwing off the chakra or the feng shui or something in here.
If you're trying to throw me off my game, let me just say it's not going to work as well as you think!
Is it hot? I feel like it's hot? Does that make sense? Does anything make sense?
Win, lose... we'll all be equal in the grave.
At least I don't have to worry about Arcangelo popping up and being a nuisance.
Maybe this is retribution for something I did in a past life...
I might need some good vibes to balance me out...
Aww, man! I'm such an herb! I need, like, a do-over!
Oops. So much for not getting distracted...
Ugh. Base feelings cloud the mind to reason... or something.
I mean, even if I lose I'm still popular, right?
... I'm getting the feeling that... I might be getting taken for a ride...
Black clouds gather turning day into night. Turning sunshine into rain. The world is gray and so am I.
Oh, great, it's wackness all the way down.
Giving up won't make me feel better and seeing this through won't make me feel worse.
There's that familiar melancholy.
If I lose this one, then I lost it for you.
Usually a little mistake like this would send me spiraling into a deep blue funk.
Ah, shoot. This is so, I dunno, wack? Honestly, I'm feeling the vibe a bit too much right now to get bent out of shape about it.
Even a fall can be elegant.
Remember me for the man of elegance and fashion I was and not the muttering, sweaty mess I became...
W-what? Good cards? In this economy?
I appreciate your dedication to my misery, but at some point the courageousness has diminishing returns.
Uh... maybe we should take a break? Is it time for snacks?

Neo Yokio is, of course, the greatest city in the world {small}probably{!reset}. We've got the finest dining, the most elegant clothes, and a demon situation that is totally under control thanks to me.
Ha, no! I don't really "study" magic. I'm just a natural!
Amazing. Now, is that any part of your body?
I guess I could stand to be a little bit taller. Not too tall, though. I want to have good stature without being totally gangly.
Ahem... uh... bit awkward now...
Oh, come on... that's hardly fair...
When I need pampering, I have Charles draw me a hot bath and play me the latest hits. That's the ideal right there.
I don't know if this counts, but there is Damien Hirst sculpture For the Love of God. It's a platinum cast skull with over 8,000 flawless diamonds embedded in it. That's pretty unusual, right?
I'm still not convinced you're not trying to lull me into a false sense of security, but it's not like it's totally killing the vibe...
Hi. I feel like we got off on the wrong foot. My name is Kaz Kaan, gentleman of peerless elegance.
There's only one sure-fire get rich quick scheme, and that's to get born rich. It's fucked, but that's capitalism.
If you know anything about demons, I have an exorcism I'm supposed to perform on some heiress later. It'd be nice if someone else could do it so I can play bocce ball with my boys instead.
Does it really take that long to learn? Huh. I've just always sort of been able to do it. It didn't occur to me there might be books about it...
Heck, I'd invite Lexi and Gottlieb to play. It might be kinda weird for me, but they're both pretty open minded and they always make things fun.
Teasing is so grade school. Doesn't matter if you like the person or not, you're just being a herb.
Baths are usually private relaxation time, but I wouldn't be totally opposed to present company joining me for a little private time.
Pillow talk, definitely. I want my girl in my ear so God doesn't have to hear all the nasty things she wants done to her.
Yeah, I've had some real howlers in the sack before. There's nothing wrong with enthusiasm, but sometimes it's just too much.
Yeah, I usually keep it pretty light on the alcohol. I'm a total bummer as a drunk...

state.text: All this taking off of clothes might actually be Helena Saint Tessero's kind of game. I wonder what she's up to nowadays?
Feeling kind of blue, for some reason. Times like these I start thinking about my ex, Cathy, again. That makes me even bluer...
Woo, it's getting a little steamy in here. I hope I'm not getting drawn in again. I don't want another Sailor Pellegrino incident...
Is it weird I wore Mila Malevich's jumpsuit? I guess that old man did too... oh fuck that's even weirder...

case.state: Neo Yokio is full of fast cars and freedom, but I fly most everywhere on my butler. How does everyone else get around?
Alright, lightning round creative thinking exercise: you're dunked in your supposedly dead uncle's infinity pool and you emerge as an animal. What animal are you?
They say competition inspires innovation, but it can also breed contempt. The same people we compete with are sometimes those we have the most in common with. Don't you think?
You ever feel like life is trying to take you down just so it can sadistically kick you while you're down because everything is wack?
Sometimes enjoying the finer things picks me up when I'm feeling melancholy. I dunno. What cheers you up?
Anyone else have trouble getting over their exes or an ex? I could maybe use some insight...
Even when two people have a real connection, sometimes they just don't get together. You know what I mean? Who, to you, is the one who got away?
Karl Lagerfeld once said "vanity is the healthiest thing in life." Have you remembered to be vain?
So, anybody got a celebrity crush? Someone famous they've dreamt about a romantic evening with? It's okay if the answer is me.
Ever met someone who didn't turn out to be who they said they were? Like, a total smokeshow who is interesting and kind, but turns out to be... a real bonehead?
So, what's popular in music these days? I picked up something of an aversion to pop stars, so I'm a bit out of the loop.
Your own preferences on animals aside, would you say you're more of a cat person person or a dog person person.
Smack talk usually works better when you're actually doing well yourself.
It is kinda mind blowing to think about a cocktail party or designer brands on an alien planet. Outer space makes me think of eating freeze-dried ice cream and really horrible potatoes.
It's a bit wild to think about partying or shopping on an alien planet. I guess all those cheesy sci-fi movies prepared me for distant planets that are more... dusty and lawless.
That is... not a stereotype I'm familiar with.
Charles is equipped with state of the art statistical analysis software... that some would consider "cheating" in this context.
The suits I deal with are Armani and Chanel. Not that I expect you to appreciate that...
Believe me, Polly, you do not wanna make this about class.
Do... do you have any basis for saying that? I don't see why I couldn't.
Oh man! Aunt Agatha doesn't need to see, or hear, about any of this!
Why, only the greatest city there is: Neo Yokio. City of elegance, hub of culture, height of fashion, and home to the rich and famous.
Since I doubt you're smoking MS cigarettes, I'm going to guess those pistols are Berettas.
That's a bit reductive. I'm Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor. I exemplify all it means to be a high-class gentleman. I'm a taste-maker. A trend-setter. Kaz Kaan is a brand unto itself.
Why are you asking me? I didn't make the drink, I just promoted it.
A gentleman takes his losses on the cheek. Besides, it wouldn't do to be a poor sport with a lady about.
If you want to examine me, feel free. Kaz Kaan is an open book, happy to satisfy any curiosity you have about me.
Those aren't necessarily mutually exclusive, Y'shtola. I could probably show you what I mean if you'd admit you'd like me to.
You wound me, Y'shtola. Don't we have a rapport by now? Are we not kindred spirits?
What I have under my underwear has very little to do with my ranking on the bachelor board!
That's a weirdly specific question about an event you weren't around for. How do you know about all of that?
You can't be serious. I mean, you specifically can't be serious ever and especially not about this.
I don't need some dumb blonde guy pestering me about being homies everywhere I go, thank you very much.
Are you just saying random words and trying to pass it off as profound?
I don't know what you're expecting, but it sounds like you're going to be disappointed.
Why, no occasion could be more special than chancing to meet you here, Ms. Heris. Regrettably, I am woefully underdressed for such an auspicious meeting.
You've got a keen eye, Lady Estelle. The Kaan family is at the head of the magistocracy in Neo Yokio. Safe to say the city wouldn't be as great as if it weren't for my ancestors.
You flatter me, Ms. Cynthia, but this ensemble is my casual, everyday look. Emphasizing comfort without sacrificing style. Kaz Kaan doesn't go out in anything less.
I think expanding one's horizons is very healthy, Ms. Fujibayashi. I know what the women of Neo Yokio think of me, but some outside opinions could help me improve my branding.
Uh... as much as anyone else, I imagine? Good fun for a rainy day with the boys, if nothing else.
I understand completely, Ms. Miura. Discrimination on the basis of wealth is so gauche. One's money, or rather their family's money, doesn't make them a better or more worthy human...
Ms. Maye! I, uh, I mean, thanks for the offer, but we hardly know each other. I just feel like it wouldn't be appropriate...
That's... complicated. The magistocracy enjoys an elevated position, sure, but the other noble families have always held us in contempt. We have keep to proving ourselves, prove we're still useful.
Of course, Lady Macneary. My family rose through the ranks in Neo Yokio thanks to our ability to use magic. Nowadays there's less danger though, so we're more of a proper noble house now.
Of course, but the road to true elegance is different for everyone. Fashion must be true to oneself, honest and open. Being comfortable in your clothes always projects a sense of confidence.
Look, I'm not here to exorcise anyone. If you don't cause any trouble, I won't be forced to bust open a can of magical whoop-ass on you.
Yeah, it doesn't take a trained demon slayer to pick you out of a crowd. Can we just mutually agree not to cause a scene? It's a bit gauche to mix business and pleasure.
Don't try and start trouble with me, Chara. I'm not here to put down a... whatever you are. Besides, Aunt Agatha wouldn't appreciate me doing charity work.
Miss Jura, men who know appearances are important are a dime a dozen. Men of true elegance are a rare breed, but among them Kaz Kaan reigns supreme.
It's not so strange for a man to try and look his best. Whether or not every man succeeds is a different story. I'll warn you: it wouldn't be fair to men everywhere to hold them to my high standards.
Uh, Marlboro? I don't smoke, so I don't know any cigarette brands. Unless you mean the guns, in which case I think they're Berettas.
My best pick-up line? I don't know, Princess. How can I be sure you're actually worth it?
Well, I consider myself a gentleman of elegance first and foremost, but I have been known to exorcise a demon or two. It's my duty to the public.
I'm good in that department, thanks. I've already got a beautiful headstone picked out in the Kaan family plot. It's peaceful. Sometimes I like to visit and lay down on it.
Death is not a parallel move. The key to dying well is living well, and the key to living well is surrounding yourself with the people and things you enjoy the most.
Ha, monotony? Never heard of her! Hardly any two days for me are the same for me. Things are usually pretty chill, but if I wait long enough something exciting is bound to happen.
I'm not one to turn down an experience like this. Good chance to meet some new people, the sort I'd never be able to meet with otherwise.
They can be. I never know when my aunt is going to call me for a job. I try to keep my schedule flexible so I can just chill with my boys, but when duty calls...
You're not wrong, even if I do feel a little like a fish out of water, but an elegant man of taste makes his way no matter where he finds himself.
Oh, you like it? Wow, uh, thanks! Usually people think it's weird. The upkeep isn't too much, but I do have to wax the strands every so often.

My aim is for the height of elegance. Understated luxury, a bold take on classical style, pioneering a new understanding of material and function, and above all being true to myself and my own vanity.
Now my vibes are all messed up...
Am I being punked? You can't possibly expect me to believe I'd lose like this again...
Am I missing something here? You know, it's not so easy to pull the cashmere over my eyes...
There is for sure a bout of melancholy at the end of all of this...
There's just no way! Don't I deserve, like, a do over at this point?
Of course. Why not me again?
C'mon, Kaz, that was just bad luck. Don't psych yourself out...
That's horrible! Does it really have to be me again?
Looks like it's time for me to get down to it. I guess this is where the fun begins.
It wouldn't be a good look if I didn't lose at all! Gotta give the people what they want!
Yes, well, I figured I shouldn't just win outright. Best to make it an even spread, for appearance's sake.
Losing is all part of the fun. It's hardly exciting if I just stand here in my clothes the whole time.
Looks like you got me this time. Still, I'm doing better than I thought. Do you guys not get out much?
Looking around, I am a bit overdressed for this occasion. I could do with a dressing down.
Haven't had enough of Kaz Kaan yet? I guess I can understand.
This is getting kind of dicey. It's not going to come right down to the wire, is it?
Came this close to pulling it off too. That's a bummer...
I can deal with another loss. It wouldn't look good if I played strip poker and only took off my shoes.
It's not over yet. Maybe I could turn this around if I gave it a gentleman's try.
Okay, I could stand to be doing a little better. I thought I was being careful.
C'est la vie...
Yeah... just like Freddie Miles' party.
Can I just have a moment to say being overdressed for this is extremely gauche?
Seriously? This is killing my vibes...
Oh well, there we go. I could've handled that better.
I feel like I'm being a perfectly good sport here and not getting any recognition for it.
Oh, come on! It's one thing to lose, but another entirely to be losing!
If they hear about this back home, I'm going to plummet off the Bachelor Board...
Can't exactly be on the bachelor board if I'm not a bachelor, now can I?
It was invented by my friends, and I trust them. Lexy and Gottlieb don't have a dishonest bone between the two of them.
Life is a swirling maelstrom of disappointment and betrayal. In this sweet oasis, I must drink deep of simple joys and raise the ship of my heart on the tides of companionship.
Here, let me get this shirt off so you can get a closer look. I'd never stand in the way of the pursuit of higher knowledge, Miss Rhul.

I must confess to being quite charmed by you, Y'shtola. This is certainly no arena for subtlety, and I would be terribly distraught if I missed my chance to make my impression on you. I'm just being true to myself, and by extension true to us.
Why rush into getting to know each other? There's plenty of time for that over dinner or while flying over the city at night.
You know, I'm starting to like you a little less...
Is that so?
I don't think we have enough time to cover all of that.

What is it to be homies? What is this fleeting, ephemeral sense of homieness one might feel for or think of another person? Are we really anything more than just two people passing briefly in this chaotic and uncaring swirl we call life?
And now you're just saying completely random stuff to throw me off... it's kind of creepy. Would you knock it off?
I can't believe I have to say this, but don't freak out. Also, my name still isn't Ralph.
Right. Real funny, Y'shtola. You can't actually be serious about that... can you?

Your friends just need to find their own brand. Find what feels right to them. Of course, one must keep in mind the appropriateness of seasonal attire. And they should avoid denim, and corduroy is right out. A good place to start is to pick out a sensible blazer, fitted if they can help it. Good clean lines are timeless, always a classic. Of course, formal drapery is always a daring look for an elegant man...
My outfit is certainly what I'd call everyday wear. Do you like it, Miss Heris?
I mean, in issues that really matter everyone gets a vote. Neo Yokio is still a democracy, whether you're rich or poor.
We're not "royal," but we are magical. That's how we got where we are in society. Unless you've got a mage in your ancestry, you've got no chance at using magic.

I guess I don't want to come across as elitist. Behind the money and family legacy, I'm just a regular guy. Well, a magical regular guy. At any rate, I just want to be elegant without being snobby or bragging. Kaz Kaan's branding is inclusive, not exclusive.
Sounds like you're more interested in my family's money than you are in me.

But my attire is what I do. I am a man of elegant taste. I seek the height of fashion. My personal brand is ever evolving and requires my constant attention. And not just close. I sample the finest of fine society.

I wouldn't say I'm important. I mean, sure, I'm Neo Yokio's number one bachelor, one of it's most prolific influencers, and the best demon hunter around, but that doesn't make me "important." At least, that's what I think.
Ah, nothing too special. Mostly I just shoot lightning from my hands and exorcise demons. I can {small}usually{!reset} tell when someone or something is a demon with it as well.
Damn, you're right, your highness. There's a lot I could learn from an impressive woman like yourself. Maybe we can have a chat later about it. I'll buy the cocktails if you'd do me the honor.
I had hoped to avoid work, but it's not like I'd just sit on my hands during an emergency. Besides, it'd be nice to take a job from a beauty like you for a change.
It's nothing extravagant. I wanted my resting place to be austere. Just a stone headstone from the family quarry and a stone slab covering the grave itself. My grave is, of course, already dug.
Personally, it wouldn't bother me at all. I'm sure other people would talk, but they'll talk no matter what. The only real question is what will they say.
I wouldn't be much of a gentleman if I allowed you to do that without returning the favor.
Ahem... well, there is a bit of a luxury in being an unknown, I'll admit.
The whole family is depending on me to do my job and maintain our reputation in Neo Yokio. It can be a drag, but a gentleman knows that the most important part of a burden is that you carry it.
It's nice to see some new faces around here. Most gatherings in Neo Yokio I attend are just the same socialites each time.
You know, usually I end up in these sort of games with people I know, like the other social elites of Neo Yokio and beyond.
This is a weird way to meet new people, but it is pretty exciting. Usually this type of thing happens at parties full of people I already know, celebrities, and celebrities I already know.
This is a Lemaire blazer. I can't just crumple it up and throw it on the floor. Clothing this refined requires care and caution.
Okay, I know what you're all thinking and yes this is a Lemaire blazer. I'm not just going to drop it on the floor and I'd like to keep it where I can see it.
I don't mean to be rude, but just keep in mind that this is a Lemaire blazer. I'm not going to just toss it on the ground where someone could come along and take it, or worse: step on the seams!
A gentleman must have a sport, mine is field hockey. I'd say it keeps me in pretty reasonable shape.
As a man of elegance and bachelor, I spend a lot of my time playing field hockey with my team: The West Side Gentlemen. Keeps my mind sharp and my body in shape.
You might be wondering how Neo Yokio's most eligible bachelor stays in shape. The answer: field hockey.
I wouldn't be surprised if this all was some kind of ploy by my Aunt to get me to work. None of you are demons in disguise, are you?
This isn't, like, some kind of set-up by my Aunt, right? There are no demons around here? I don't mean to be rude, but I am a little suspicious.
Okay, I'm just gonna say it. This whole place is weird. Like, possible demon activity weird. I don't think you guys are possessed, at least in my professional opinion...
Wait, what underwear am I wearing today? It's not something inelegant, I hope.
H-hold on a second. What underwear did I put on today? Oh man... please don't be... please!
Am I wearing... uh, quick question! You guys wouldn't judge me if my underwear had little... uh... you know what, nevermind...
Well, I guess this is goodbye Ralph Lauren. You have served me admirably.
Ralph, you were my only ally in this fight. I can only hope your sacrifice won't be in vain.
I can't believe Ralph failed me. Maybe I should pray to Coco Chanel...
Being on the bachelor board is a great honor, but I'd much rather "take a lover" than keep my place on the board.
I think I'd rather try and explain how to make a caprese martini than dive into whatever this dumpster fire of trust issues you've got going on is.
Knowing I'm in your thoughts will definitely keep my spirits up.
We could study magic, or we could study a little anatomy. Either way, we could have a lot of fun.
Well, if you're gonna make me choose...
Would it kill you to at least pretend you're impressed?
Of all the times to humor me, you choose now.
Right, and what exactly does any of that have to do with anything? Seriously!
Well, one thing you have going for you is that self-confidence, even if it's a delusional sort.

state.text: Chocolate doesn't cure the wackness of the world, but it eases the pain momentarily.

case.state: And he's back. I guess the upshot is I'm so confused I keep forgetting I'm almost naked.
I don't know what to tell you. This is how all my boys do it. The modern gentleman is manscaped! We're not cavemen...
That is both an insult to me and the proud tradition of the Bachelor Board...
Well, not every mage is rich and famous. I've got a cousin who basically just races ATVs and lives in a pool house.
Oh man, I could sum that up in one word: comfort! Sometimes you gotta suffer for fashion, but I suffer well enough on my own most days.
Thank you, Fluttershy, but believe me when I say that the thrill is double for me.
Trust me; you never have to compromise with anything when it comes to me... wait, did you call me a dandy?
Thanks, but I'll pass. Death is the final mystery whose coming solution gives each new day a sense of importance. Besides, I want to stick around for as many new winter lines as I can.
No offense, but I did peg you as the mischievous sort. Well, it wouldn't be the first time I was interested in a girl with... let's say "exciting" rumors around her.
Consider this an open invitation to try.
From the way you've been talking, I get the feeling you might be the thing to follow me home.
If they are, they sure have a weird way of showing it...
I serve at your pleasure, your majesty.
At least I have my boys with me for those times. Lexi and Gottlieb always know how to make it a good time.
No danger of running into exes or Arcangelo here. At least, I really hope not...
Though, it is a bit weird doing this with strangers. Maybe I can get to know you guys a bit better before I lose another hand.
And although I trust you guys, could you just keep an eye out for me? There's no telling who else is skulking around looking for clothes and underwear to steal.
I caught wind that there's someone or something going around jacking people's clothes. I'm not sure if it's true, but it'll be a cold day in hell when someone takes Kaz Kaan's clothes.
I'm sure my sense of style has caught your eyes, but please don't think about taking my clothes. You can wear the clothes, sure, but the brand is personal to Kaz Kaan.
Hunting demons burns calories too, I admit, but field hockey is far more elegant than my job.
A man of elegance and fashion such as myself has to look after his figure, after all. Gotta look good even when you're not wearing anything, am I right?
It doesn't hurt that I'm, you know, very good at field hockey. Best player in Neo Yokio if my record has anything to do with it.
I've been duped before, and I don't plan on making that mistake again. I'll find out for sure if you're lying.
Don't think you can fool me for long if you are a demon. One touch and I'll {small}probably{!reset} know.
I mean, sure, I've been tricked before, but I absolutely learned my lesson! Double check everything and shun mainstream pop music!
Ah, saved by Ralph Lauren. The only thing more inelegant than standing around in my underwear would be standing around in cheap underwear.
Good, some tasteful Ralph Lauren clean white briefs. Guess my reputation is safe.
A man of elegance shouldn't go too far without luxury underwear. You never know what's gonna happen out there.
I prefer Armani suits to my birthday suit. I just want to be clear on that point.
I hope this is all in good taste, for all of our sakes.
Go ahead. Boo. Cheer. Hiss. Karma has a way of catching up with that sort of thing.
Bobobo, there's something about your personal branding that's... confusing.
Guess I owe Gottlieb and apology. Other people really do wear glasses like that.
You seem like a fairly sturdy guy, Takatoshi. What's your sport? Who do you play for?
Are you really able to use magic, Twisted Fate? I mean, card tricks are neat, I guess, but that's not actually magic. It's just sleight of hand... or illusion? Something like that.
Bobobo, you can't just be completely unhinged each and every round. It's not a sustainable image! You're bound to crash and burn! To be unexpected, sometimes you must be expected.
And now you're gonna be naked, Bobobo. Honestly, what did you expect would happen? Do I even want to know?
Yeah... I'm pretty sure I know what's going to happen now.
Guess this whole "stockpiling" tactic didn't work out for you in the long run.
I think it's time for you to face the music, Bobobo. No more hijinks, no more pranks, no more Don Patch.
Tough break, ~target~. I hope your personal brand can survive this.
Too early to break out the champagne.
I guess not every bad thing happens to me.
That's terrible, ~target~. Do you think some chocolate would cheer you up?
Man, I could be at Bergdorf's right now feeling out my next big look.
Only room for one bachelor at the top, ~target~.
For times like these, I find soothing ocean noises bring me serenity.
A man's personal branding should bring him luck. Maybe that's too hard for you to pull off, ~target~.
Oh man, ~target~! Don't tell me you're surprised!
Well, if I was dressed like ~target~, then I might be desperate to strip too.
Hoo-boy. She's back. Now what?
I did like the overall look, Y'shtola, but unfortunately it's kind of fallen apart without all the individual pieces. I don't think the dress stands up on its own.
Wish I could use my magic to summon Charles like that...
Ice breakers? Huh, I'm game to answer {small}as long as it's not too embarrassing.{!reset}
So, a warrior and a celebrity? You must be a busy woman. The double life is tough, nevermind the double spotlight.
Pink hair? Magic? Didn't think I'd run into another magistocrat here.
Dark Magician Girl is a bit of a mouthful for a title. There's not a short version I could call you or maybe even a name?
A pop star? Here? Can't say I'm familiar with your work, but if it's not mainstream I wonder how that could be. I'm always up on the underground pop scene.
That's quite the striking look you have, Ms. Fortune. If it's not too forward to say, most girls dress to hide their scars, but yours seem to put a spotlight on them.
Whoever the pilot of this mecha butler is, looking at the chassis it's clear they must be pretty short.
Seems like she's a singer. Here's to hoping this idol is who she says she is...
A real flesh and blood maid! Don't see many of those anymore. I'm afraid in Neo Yokio, robots took your job.
Zoey seems peaceful enough, but there's a part of me that's worried this is going to turn into an exorcism.
Pink hair? Is it naturally pink? Somehow I don't think you're a magistocrat.
This girl is so cute and shy. Not at all the kind of girl I expected to run into here. Not really the sort of girl I run into anywhere, actually...
Maybe I'll get lucky and see where that tail begins...
Not a lot of girls like you in Neo Yokio, Y'shtola. Not a lot of girls like you anywhere I know of, to be honest.
You strike me as a classy socialite, Y'shtola, much like myself. If you were from Neo Yokio, I'm sure we'd be very well acquainted by now.
Uh-oh, Y'shtola. Maybe it isn't just black cats that bring bad luck!
Kinda feels like you're holding back on us, Y'shtola. Not feeling very daring?
Time for you to cast a different kind of spell on us, Y'shtola.
If you're nervous, maybe it would help if we talked about something else? Take your mind off of it? You'll be naked before you even notice!
Bandages? A Helenist? Here?
Gotta say, you've got a very distinct style. Very strong branding. I'm way into the butterfly motif. Very elegant.
Looks like bad luck, Fluttershy. You're braver than most for sticking with this though.
I hope I haven't been too forward with you, Fluttershy. It's just that you're quite beautiful and I really feel like something is clicking between us.
If you're nervous, you could imagine for a moment that it's just you and me here as you strip, Fluttershy.
It may not be very gentlemanly to make a lady strip, but we also don't live in the 19th century anymore. At least, I don't.
Definitely getting some good vibes now.
Sorry about that, ~target~. I'll have Charles send you some chocolate to make up for it.
This might seem good for me and bad for ~target~, but the universe has a way of evening things out.
Alright! Kaz Kaan, proving once again why he's the ichiban!
Oh, man! I never get this lucky! I'm probably in for a real nasty surprise coming up.
Sorry, ~target~. Guess we just can't get enough of you.
Don't worry, ~target~. A man of elegance would never kiss and tell, or look and tell in this case.
Well... seeing ~target~ strip a little more would make my ~background.time~.
I might be a gentleman, but I'm still a guy. No point in pretending I'm not trying to beat you here, ~target~.
Well, that was a waste of time. Looks like it's a do-over.
Layers of insanity...
And that's why a rocket launcher is not a gentleman's weapon... okay, there's a lot more nuance to it than that, but you get my point.
Are you sure you don't need that to protect what decency you have left?
Uh-huh. I mean, you could have just left that on. It made you less... naked... somewhat.
Oh, I thought you were just gonna leave that on. No judgment either way, just saying.
A man should accessorize. It's the little things that can really pull an ensemble together.
I don't accessorize as much as I used to. I had a watch, but... oh, why get into it?
Timepieces, hats, masks. These things have their place in fashion, even for men.
So basically that was a big waste of time. I don't know if you noticed, ~name~, but that wasn't exactly stepping out of your formal clothes.
And for his next trick ~name~ will pointlessly drag out his loss.
Bigger fish to fry, ~name~. For real.
Actually, I don't think that was really essential to your look. You could probably go without it, unless it has sentimental value.
Well... as a elegant man, I have to honestly say that maybe your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(weren't|wasn't)~ pulling the look together after all.
It's not that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(weren't|wasn't)~ nice or flattering, but I'd say this ensemble passes without it.
Wait, what was that? A demon? Or something else?
No! Wait! Don't run! As a gentleman, it's my sacred duty to assist you in times of stress and trouble!
... She's cute for a butterfly.
Aww, your ~clothing~? There was something kind of sexy about the fact that you still had it on despite, well, you know.
Okay, so ~target~ is literally going to leave nothing to the imagination. That's fair, that's fair.
Tsk, not the ~clothing~. That look was really working for you. I mean, it's held together mostly by the excessive nudity, but still!
A lady must accessorize. The right accent makes the difference between a classy ensemble and a total dud.
I can appreciate a fashion conscious lady who accessorizes. Very elegant.
Do you consider yourself fashion conscious, ~target~? Seems like your outfit was carefully put together.
Well, of course as an elegant gentleman I have only the most refined tastes; however, a gentleman would never think to rush a lady when she's getting undressed.

state.text: Uh... I guess it was something else? I guess that's good. I'm feeling a bit of melancholy anyway; I don't wanna work...

case.state: Gah! Head! Off! Fell! What?!
W... huh? She's a... hot witch?

state.text: No, it wasn't for love. Look, I wasn't even supposed to be driving the car in the first place, but I wasn't the only unintended passenger...

case.state: Not entirely necessary to have taken that off, but it was fun to watch you strip.
Uh, yeah, still sexy, ~target~.
All I'm saying is underwear models with big bangles or necklaces is a vibe.
Though, no bauble like your ~clothing~ could distract from your beauty, ~target~.
Although, with a body like yours they should be having you wear things to convince people to buy them.
You seem to me a natural beauty, ~target~. Your ensemble is really held together by you, I'm afraid.
I am not here. I am somewhere else... far more elegant...
Yeah... of course... because your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(was|were)~ what we were all distracted by...
So I guess you just forgot you were wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(that|those)~, right, ~name~?
Uh, why take off ~clothing.ifPlural(that|those)~? Or, I mean, why take of ~clothing.ifPlural(that|those)~ now?
Maybe I should have brought Charles with me. Aunt Agatha will be pissed if she calls and I'm not there to answer.
I think your style is a little lacking, ~target~. Maybe I could give you some pointers. Show you how a Neo Yokian dresses.
Yeah, I'd get rid of the ~clothing~ too. It really confuses the color story you've got going on.
Man, with rims that wide you think you'd notice right when they fell off.
Seriously. At this point, why even bother?
Yeah, well... I'm sure it's someone's fetish.
Can we get back to the fun part of this game again?
I am feeling a shopping trip coming on. I see Bergdorf's in my future.
See, ~target~, now that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone you can see how it didn't really compliment your outfit. I mean, look at you. What's changed?
Maybe we can hurry this along. I'm feeling a bout of melancholy coming on.
Excuse me wwwwhat?!
Wwwwwwwwwwwwhat the...
Interesting... choice?
It's not much, but it's not like there's much left anyway.
Taking off your ~clothing~ now? While you're... okay, damn. Maybe that's a bit kinky.
Since you kept ~clothing.ifPlural(that|those)~ on for this long, I figured ~clothing.ifPlural(it|they)~ might be sentimental. I guess that might be kinda silly...
I really dig this whole taking things off slowly deal. Feels like some kind of exotic show.
Are you teasing us or just shy, ~target~? Either way, I find myself endeared to it...
I guess it wouldn't be very elegant to tear off all your clothes at once. The slow approach is so much more... sensational.
Never fear. Kaz Kaan is a renown demon slayer. A mischievous ghost is nothing I can't deal with. They'd be hard pressed to get one past me.
Well... at least she's more than just a head?
So, she's seen past death's thin veil, only to return this plain of ignorant mortals. Cool. Cool, cool, cool...
So, I guess you just like putting on a show, ~target~.
Huh... with all your clothes that would've been pretty underwhelming, but like this... damn.
Always a pleasure watching ~target~ strip, no matter how little she's wearing or how little she's taking off.
Uh, I hope I'm not being too forward. I don't usually play this sort of game with people I don't know at all.
That's not weird for me to say, right? I guess we don't really know each other all that well.
I don't particularly mean anything by that. It's just odd being here like this with attractive strangers.
They say clothes make the man, and I really get that. A person chooses what they wear, but their body is something they're born with.
Karl Lagerfeld once said "Don't dress to kill, dress to survive." You might've taken that to heart, ~target~, and brought a few more layers.
I see you're transitioning to more of a summer fashion now.
Who would've thought we'd end up like this? I don't even get that undressed in front of my boys!
If you're nervous, maybe just pretend your in the dressing room of a department store. That's not a weird place to be in your underwear.
Come on, ~target~. Don't be shy! This is probably the least embarrassing thing you will be doing today.
No shame in that, I suppose.
Well, those aren't clothes strictly speaking, but I'm not gonna stop you.
Dang, your ~clothing~? This is gonna be a treat!
Couldn't be happier to be put at a table with ~target~ than right now.
Wait, did I remember to ask you who you were wearing?
Yeah, this doesn't exactly make me trust you...
A gentleman doesn't kiss and tell... not that I know who I would tell.
You don't need, like, a chair or something, do you?
I guess now I have to ask who you're still wearing.
Yeah, forget being a runway model. Time for ~target~ to make the move to being an underwear model.
As an elegant gentleman, I have to try not to stare too much. Doesn't keep me from admitting I'd like to.
Uh... missile? Missile? Missile! Missile!
Nothing to be ashamed of, ~target~. We're here in the spirit of admiration.
Don't be shy, ~target~. The only real thing you have to be ashamed of is being bad at cards.
Just like being in the lockers before field hockey. Nothing but guys with no shirts slapping each other on the ass. It's not very elegant.
Come on, target! Don't be shy! I'm sure you don't have anything I haven't seen in the mirror!
It would be better if he wasn't a raving lunatic...
Next time, let's leave the heavy weaponry at home.
Y'know, the clothes weren't really what I was talking about...
This was all very ill-advised.
I'm just saying, there's no reason to be embarrassed. It's not very elegant, but we can't all pull it off as well as I can.
Not too shabby, ~target~. You must be popular with the women in whatever circle you run in.
Field hockey keeps me in this shape. I wonder what keeps you in yours, ~target~.
I'm too much of a fashion icon to be seen walking around in public without my shirt on, but I'm sure you could pull it off ~target~.
...Yeah, that's par for the course.
You don't usually wear pants? That's... somehow not the strangest thing about you.
Okay, so this is the part where it gets weird between us, ~target~. Between all of us, I guess.
Not what I came here to see, but I did come here to win. Nothing elegant about losing a game like this.
No reason this has to be weird... except for the part where I see your dick.
It's looking less like the locker room and more like the showers...
Oh... well... can we just move on without me having to make a comment?
Is it cold in here, or something? Well, I guess I'm in here and I know it's-- you know what, nevermind.
Any comment I make here wouldn't be very nice, and that wouldn't be very elegant of me.
An elegant gentleman, when put in this position, would probably just give you a pat on the back. Just a metaphorical one since you're... you know.
So this is how you please the ladies, or the lads. Or both.
I bet you don't leave anyone disappointed at night, or day. I don't know what your availability is.
We're friends now, right, ~target~? So we know there's no need to compare among friends.
If anybody was unsure of you before, there's no way they're not keen on you now.
I mean... it's not elegant.
Oh man, no wonder you're okay with playing strip poker!
So... when they measure your inseam... is there any trouble with that?
How do you not put that in designer briefs? You wouldn't put your best friend in a cramped locker; you'd put him in a hammock!
H-hey! No funny business, demon!
Damn it! I should have known better than to trust a fucking demon! Now she's going to...
Huh? What? For real?!
Showing her breasts and a light show. Guess it's not the first time I've seen that happen.
Gotta say, ~target~, I'm glad you're as bad at cards as you are.
A gentleman wouldn't make fun or stare, but in certain situations...
Well, I'm excited. Is anyone else excited? You, ~player~?
Now these are the best vibes a gentleman like me could ask for.
~Target~ is real cute. I mean, I thought so before, but now I think... I'm shutting up.
I kind of want to tease ~target~ a bit, but that wouldn't be very elegant.
Man... ~target~ is so cute, I mean- ~target~ is real cute, I mean- ~target~ is...
I was wondering what color your nipples would be. There's no denying ~target~ is super cute.
Oh wow... that's uh... uuuuh...
... Turning into a cat... girl? That's uh... new.
There's... not really an elegant way to compliment you on your... fine bosom.
No matter how elegant I am, I'm not immune to these carnal charms of yours...
Dang, why was I born a mage and not a poet?
A man's curiosity is never sated, ~target~. Now that I know what they look like, I gotta wonder about how they feel...
Oh, ha ha. Yeah. Hilarious. Nice tits, by the way.
That's-- those are... what ~clothing.ifPlural(was|were)~ your ~clothing~ made of?
S-so... like, all your tops are custom then, yeah?
Never been with a woman with such, err... not that I meant that we should get together. I mean, we could?! Am I blathering? I feel like I'm blathering!
I guess this confirms what we already knew: they're huge.
Uh... so... when you get fitted, do those... require alterations be made?
Most models don't have breasts like those. It's kind of a shame, really.
I would never judge a lady on the size of her breasts... but a man of elegance knows world class when he sees it.
Ahem, well... I forgot what I was going to say. I guess I'll need your number so I can let you know when I finally remember.

state.text: Well... maybe the world isn't all that wack after all.

case.state: I was... not expecting that... those? Uh...
Sorry again. I know there's no way to make this elegant.
To gaze upon the garden gates. It's more of a privilege than I expected.
Man, I don't know if I'm nervous or excited, but my heart is going haywire.
Now this I gotta see. Makes the risk and embarrassment all worth it, if you ask me.
Did... did I miss something?
... Well... different isn't bad.

state.text: Somehow the bitter unfairness of the world is melting away. Beauty was the cure all along.

case.state: Forget elegance, this is exquisite.
A gentleman has to keep these sort of thoughts to himself, but I could be coerced if you asked nicely.
For you, I'll be a gentleman, unless you have other ideas.
Some things would be worth giving up the fame of being a bachelor for...
She's not going to start shooting again... is she?
We're all gonna die...
Give me one second to come to grips with the fact that the cold embrace of death may come on suddenly and unjustly...
Ugh... duck and cover, I guess.
Well, Ms. Heris, feel free to get comfortable. You're not at work anymore, so why not put up your coat and relax a little with us.
My apologies, Lady Estelle. As a gentleman, I wouldn't dare impugn your honor by playing poorly on purpose, but that also puts you in a precarious position. A real quandary for a gentleman...
Man, she's pretty lively. I'm not sure I'm going to be able to keep up with you, Kora.
You've quite the sense of style, Cynthia. So dark and mature, like a fresh cup of coffee. Stimulating, deep, and powerful. Such a striking and complete display of personal branding.
Gotta admire a girl with spirit like Ms. Fujibayashi. You strike me as a sportswoman, but which sport do you play?
Seems like a strange choice to build your personal brand around Uno, but you're so sincere about it there's no arguing that it isn't working for you...
Ms. Miura, are you faithfully following your academy's dress code? Your tie is loose and your shirt is untucked. Speaking of the shirt, when did you get it pressed last? Seems awfully wrinkly...
Animal print? Nowadays? A daring choice, but you're nothing if not daring, Ms. Maye...
Very interesting clothes you have, Fina. The style is very foreign to me, but is this popular where you come from?
I have to say, Petra, that I'm way into your vibe. I mean, I must sound like a total herb, but the branding you've developed has such a fresh aesthetic.
Man, the hot ones are always some kind of monster... well, maybe not all the hot ones, but still...
She's cute, but... damn if she's not evil...
Right, a demon pretending to be a beautiful woman. I'm not going to fall for that... {small}again...{!reset}
So, this is space fashion? It certainly isn't understated.
A dress from out of this world? Well, it's rather brave by Earth standards.
Okay, be honest with me, Meia. Are spandex bodysuits really the cutting edge of fashion on your planet? Just tell me the truth! I can handle it!
Long has man dreamed of casting off his sublunary shackles and roaming free amongst the stars, but is it worth it? Why struggle if spandex bodysuits become fashion forward?
Probably a bad idea to hit on the lady packing heat, right? No matter how hot she is?
Look, I don't want to cause any trouble, but you're not a demon are you, Ahri? There's just... something about you...
Never had to exorcise a succubus before. I'd kind of like to keep it that way, if you catch my drift.
It's refreshing to meet a like-minded, young professional here. I'm something of a funerary enthusiast myself, but we don't have to discuss your work if that's distasteful.
I'll admit, I'm a bit jealous of you, Hu Tao. I wish my family business was something as respectable as yours. Honestly, exorcism is so pass.
So, how do the exorcists where you come from party? Black tie galas? Poolside cocktails? Craft beers with a live tiger?
So, what's the night life like back home for you, Hu Tao? What does an evening out look like for you?
I must say, it has been a singular pleasure getting to know you, Hu Tao.
This girl seems way too put together to be in a place like this...
I've still got my eye on you, just so you know. I still don't know what you're up to, but you won't get anything past me, alright?
This wouldn't be my first time entertaining a foreign dignitary, but entertaining royalty is a first.
You seem to be quite elegant yourself, ~target~. I'm sure we could learn a lot for each other.
~Target~ is a little... how do I put this nicely? Vibrant? Eccentric? Disturbed?
~Target~ seems to me to be right at home here. Nothing wrong with that!
The energy in this group feels a bit off. It's putting a bit of a damper on my vibes.
It's a real shame you'll have to strip, ~target~. I find your outfit quite tasteful.
Maybe as ~target~ strips off their clothes we can also start peeling away this persona they've got going on...
Gotta figure there would be people like ~target~ here.
You get out of the world the attitude you put in, ~target~. Your karma might not turn around unless you can put out some more positive vibes.
So, ~target~ is something of a recluse? Like, full hikikomori? What brought that on? Speaking out against society? Fed up with materialism? So mysterious...
I guess ~target~ doesn't get out much. Welcome to the rest of the world.
See, now you're thinking straight. Now is the time to answer that call.
You do realize for that to work you'd need to be standing there in more than just your underwear like a herb? I'm guessing you don't.
You're going to be wearing a third pair of underwear...
Ode to who's vape pen?!
Yeah, yeah, it'll take more than fake tears to trick me this time, Bobobo. Whatever you've got planned, I'm not about to let you get away with it.
Lady luck has never been very kind to me, so I might need some help from a different lady if I'm going to come out on top.
Well, I guess there is that, but there aren't really any girls who know about magic and stuff like that back home. It's nice to meet one who isn't my cousin, for once.
Still, seems like you're pretty important. Must be nice to have the ear of such powerful people.
A fair point, a fair point. Well, then maybe this white cat is bringing me good fortune.
And yet you're here. There must be something inside you that desires to see and be seen in turn. A curiosity about the clandestine thoughts of your fellow man.
Well, remember: Coco Chanel once said, "Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman." Believe me, we'll have a hard time forgetting you.
Ah, well, what to talk about? Uh... are there demons where you come from?
Okay, topics... uh, what's the fashion scene like in Eorzea?
Alright, so maybe you can... tell me about... I dunno. Do you like chocolate?
Ah, a magistocrat is me! I come from a long line of mages, and they passed down to me magical abilities and naturally pink hair! Looks like that's two things we have in common!
So, the bandages aren't a fashion statement? You're not protesting the wackness of a materialistic society?

state.text: Be my best self? That's... a lot to ask for. All this pep and pressure is making me feel a bit melancholy...

case.state: And how does that work out for you? Standing out?

state.text: Well said, Lady Estelle. Let me just say, you shouldn't feel bothered by my losses at all. In fact, if I don't lose a hand at all I would consider it a terrible disappointment.

case.state: Well, I can't blame anyone for trying, no matter how inept. It's flattering to me just to have your attention for a moment.
I agree completely. Both aesthetically and metaphorically, people have always been fascinated by the butterfly. Bursting forth from its cocoon, resplendent in beautiful colors.
Oh, my bad. I'm so wack. If you're not up on your slang, that's dope. Sorry for being a tool.
Never seen a model like this one. I wonder why the owner sent it here instead of coming themselves? Doesn't seem very sporting to me.
Well, talk about a trial by fire! If you really want to get over your shyness, I'm here rooting for you!
Augh, I'm such an herb. I didn't mean to stare, you're just... I dunno, not the sort of person I was expecting to see around here?
I am not! I mean, I am an exorcist and demon hunter {small}by trade{!reset}. Look, I'm just saying you shouldn't try anything funny or I'll be all over you.
Really? I figured you'd have mobs of guys crawling up the walls trying to ask you out, but that's for the best. Nobody wants that much attention.
Yeah, here's something: most people don't know I lost the Grand Prix on purpose. I can't, uh, really go into why, but I totally would have won if I hadn't needed to... leave.
Oh, servants? Plural? Meanwhile, my impoverished ass only has just the one butler to help me dress. Looks like I'll just have to stay humble.
That's the issue! I'm not dumb. I know if you fuck a succubus you die.
Whoa! Oh man!
Elegance requires a measure of restraint, such an overzealous play is just... hey, are you listening to me?
Gah! Nosehairs? Again?!
Exactly how many more of these does he has stored up?
Whoa! Watch where you're swinging that... what?
Yeah, that's right. Goodbye, Don Patch. You will not be sorely missed.
Oh? Taking off your panties first? That's a bold choice, Ms. Rhul. Very bold indeed.
W-what the fuck? What? What?!
Oh fuck! Oh fuck! Oh fuck!
Wait, no! Not this again!
This chick is so fucked up!
I don't wanna die!
It would delight me to no end to see you relax. As a gentleman, I will of course do anything I can to help.
Oh, so a renaissance woman? How about tennis? Keeping up with women's tennis is a little hobby of mine, truth be told.
I am a gentleman of unparalleled elegance. When I look at someone, I look respectfully.
I guess I'll have to trust you. It's not like I can verify for myself without looking a lot closer or placing my hands on you...
W-whoa, what the?! A demon? A ghost? I didn't notice the- I mean, uh...
I risk my social standing {small}and sometimes my life, I guess,{!reset} for the city, but none of my peers respect me for it. They called us rat-catchers then and Nouveau riche now.
Perhaps I could interest you in something more low-key: light music, a bottle of red, and enough candlelight for two?
And follow up question: how does that change if I show up with champagne and chocolate?
Though, I get the feeling we could get to know each other much, much better still. I get the feeling you'd be more than just a little interested in that.
Not the game for everyone, understandably.
Actually you look like you could use a few extra pairs of underwear yourself.
This is insane! Is this even a legal move?
Should I bet worried that my reaction hasn't been to do that too?
W-wait, where were you keeping that thing?
That's... how are... why are you... I have so many questions.
Yeah, I'm sure it's just luck. You'll get me with your surprise next time, Bobobo.
If that thing starts vaping, I think I'm going to completely lose my fucking mind.
... On second thought, feel free to cover yourself up with something ridiculous again. Somehow... this is worse.
Then maybe I can help you and you can satisfy my curiosity afterward. How does that sound?
Oh! W-wait! It's not , like, offensive to refer to as a "cat," is it? I swear I didn't mean anything by it!
I've always got my boys and Charles for if I feel lonely, but it's hard to talk to them about hunting demons and such. There's really only Aunt Agatha, and to her magic is all business.

state.text: Yeah, well, I was tasked with watching over a foreign race car driver in order to avoid an international incident. I, uh, kind of lost her.

case.state: "Inexperienced" would not be a word I think would describe you. You seem intelligent. Worldly. Powerful. Elegant.
I'll remember your dress for the way it slid off your shoulders, and you for the way you blushed sweetly all the while.

state.text: Careful, Y'shtola. You're making it incredibly easy to imagine your fingers curling backwards...
Okay, well, I caught none of that. How we feeling?
No, no worries. I mean, wow... that was surprisingly informative. Okay, dark chocolate for Y'shtola, got it.

case.state: I don't think there are any layers here. It's just one thick sheet of insanity all the way down with you.
Well, you may not feel sorry, but whatever other feelings my stripping makes you feel you should feel free to feel them. You feel me?
Just don't ask me to make tea or anything. I'm not sure I could even heat up water without my butler's help.
So... less a renaissance woman and more of a savant? Color me impressed...
Mm, yes. I can do me. Elegant and refined, just how I like it.

state.text: And if it pleases you, I will watch in breathless anticipation as your chrysalis falls away to reveal the full extent of your beauty.
No! I meant-what do you, what? I have experience with- I was not, I mean I have been, I mean what's wrong with my hair?
Well, if I can tempt you to be braver than you thought possible, I'm sure I'd be more than satisfied.
Hey, you get to this point and I think it's natural to be embarrassed, but hopefully it's also... exciting.

case.state: Fine, whatever. Not like I care if you lose anyway...
W-wait? What? Another-what?! Maybe I shouldn't be so surprised...
And I'm just gonna go ahead and say it: that cannot be comfortable.
Just when I thought things were already as weird as they could be...
And this just makes the three pairs of underwear thing even more unbelievable.
Well, it was nice knowing you guys. Except you, Aimee. God... damn...
I'm starting to think this isn't the greatest strip join in the multiverse...
Oh... good... still alive...
I have zero faith in this chick.
Is it over?

state.text: "Quite familiar?" Well, that would explain how you've got me so enchanted.

case.state: If not... then hello there. Kaz Kaan. Ultimate Man of Elegance. Pleased to meet you.
Sort of seems like you brought your work with you, actually. I'm not usually one to mix work and play, but I respect the grind.
Ah, but who wants to listen to me complain? I'm sure it would bore you to hear about banishing demons from stuck up aristocrats and their valuables. I'd much rather hear about you.

state.text: H-huh? What the? But she's-and Charles's is, huh? What? T-that's not fair!

case.state: Evidently, you get two exorcists like us in a room together and things are bound to get magical.
Actually, forget about going out. I think we could have plenty of fun locked inside.
I thought you might be hard to pin down, but now I'm certain I could pin you down and get you to tell me all kinds of secrets.
Chihiro? Hey! Wait! You dropped your... uh, what the?
Didn't see that coming. Not many guys can rock a skirt so effectively.
Tough luck, ~target~. I mean... really tough luck. The pits really.
From this point on, elegance is out of the question for you, ~target~.
Well, look who's fallen out! Quite the inelegant fall, I'll say!
Cheer up, ~target~. You had to have known this was going to happen. Don't tell me you're surprised.
Yeah, well, good luck with that? What do you even say in this situation? Happy hunting?
I guess you've got good material all around you.
Don't look at me like that. I'm not gonna give you any advice! You're on your own now.
You're on your own now, ~target~. Don't expect any of us to help you out!
This goes beyond locker rooms... or at least, I hope so.
Treat your pal well, ~target~. There's no pleasure without him.
Best I can do ~target~ is send positive vibes your way.
It's weird, but seeing another man do that does make you think about your own...
I'd be curious to know exactly what's on ~target~'s mind, but maybe I don't have to imagine.
This doesn't have to be too weird, ~target~. It does have to be a little weird, I think, but I'm not gonna freak out if I see you looking over here. I should be flattered, really.
~Target~ is putting out some powerful vibes.
Gotta make the best of it, ~target~. That's the way to get through it.
C'mon, ~target~, I can tell you're holding back. How long can you hold it off?
A gentleman would give some warning before cumming all of a sudden. Food for thought, ~target~.
Man, ~target~, you okay over there? Just let loose if it's time for it.
~Target~ sure is giving it his all. Maybe he forgot we're all right here.
Hiding cards in your hat? That's not even a creative way to cheat! Man, I just lost so much respect for you.
Is he... okay?
... Who cleans this place up?
I guess you could say you're done beating around the bush!
A little release tends to lift me out of melancholy... on occasion.
In the end, we're all just balls of carnal desires. Ticking like time bombs until we either find release or it's given to us.
Uh... hey, ghost guy. You missed the top button on your blazer. Do you wanna get that?
I'm not going to lie. I'm going to enjoy this.
Man, I hope my karma for this is already paid up somehow.
Coming here was a good idea after all. Humiliation and all.
~Target~ is out? Guess that means my luck hadn't run completely out today after all.
Sorrows falling like rain, washing away vain hopes and rendering us clean, but heavy. Such is the burden of cleanliness. Of godliness. Of her, the goddess, dancing in the rain...
... {small}Damn. That's really cute.{!reset}
Huh... maybe I should have Charles order a chair in the shape of a big leg. It's very... avant-garde.
Remember that I'm an elegant man of class, and I'm honor bound to assist any lady who asks me.
It's strange, but somehow seeing this in person is more... elegant.
I'll be rooting for you, ~target~. Or, anything else you want me to do...
I admire your tenacity for sticking it out, but believe me when I say I'm going to enjoy admiring you now even more.
This is more than I could have hoped for...
What's going through your head right now, ~target~? A guy's got to wonder.
You can look over here, ~target~. Can't help it if I'm your type.
~Target~ is giving me goosebumps... among other things.
Is that a hand in your pants, or are you just happy to see me?
When ~target~ walked in, I could only dream of getting an eyeful like this.
Can't say for sure how ~target~ is feeling, but I know how it's making me feel.
Girls go wild for the Ichiban. That's my burden to bear.
Oh, I know that look, ~target~. Never seen it from this far away though.
Gotta wonder if ~target~ even knows we're here anymore.
Don't hold back on our account, ~target~. You'll enjoy it more than we possibly could.
A girl like ~target~ making a face like that. Do wonders never cease?
There's some joke in there about masturbation burning a lot of calories that I'm too... excited to make.
Okay, there's got to be a pussy joke in there that I'm not thinking of right now.
Man, if we play again, remind me to wear sunglasses. Sucks to have to miss any part of that.
Damn, I should've taken notes...
Damn shame we have to leave it at that...
Elegant, even in the throes of pleasure.
So, ~target~, got any plans after this?
W-wait, this can't be right? I'm out first? B-but, that's not very... damn it!
Crap, I messed up! How could I be such an herb?
What the fuck? Seriously? How did this happen?
Time for me to leave elegance behind me... for now. The only way to get through this is to enjoy it.
My imagination's not so good, but if you're that curious you could walk over and embrace me and I promise you'll find out.
Well, Ms. Robin, if I recall you've got hands aplenty. Why not lay a few on me and see if we can't find that spot together?
Let's be real: not much of a penalty when it feels so nice.
It's liberating to be so genuine with others, to not have to hide one's pleasure.
So, what's the hookup culture like around here?
The heart pounding thrill really makes it better than usual...
It's a perfectly healthy way to relieve stress, of course, but we all know that's just an excuse.
Man, the tension of the game really sets you up for when you lose.
Kaz Kaan: prolific lover. His secret? Endurance. Take a gander.
Not the sort of intimacy I usually seek out, but it's sure something.
I'd rather a hottie was helping me out, but losers can't be choosers.
Once you get into the rhythm, everything else stops mattering...
What? You think this is the first time I've gotten off in front of strangers? Man, the parties I've been to...
If luck were really a lady, she wouldn't have tried to hard to get me naked like this. Then again, she might've not needed to try.
A little release can chase those blues away...
Kinda reminds me of when Cathy blew me under the table at that poker game...
Hmm... Cathy...
To never again know the touch of an old lover, but if I close my eyes...
Trying to focus on this, but I can't stop thinking of Cathy... and her tight, fit body...
Oh, Helena. Our parting was all to soon... but at least I hit that.
I wonder if Helena was ever wearing panties under that hospital gown...
I think the real reason Helena's hospital gown caught on in the fashion world wasn't the statement, but because the fabric was pretty thin and you could totally see people's nipples.
Helena looked great in that Chanel suite, but she looked even better out of it and all wet...
Man, I can't stop thinking about Helena St. Tessero. A classy uptown girl who moans when you grab her ass.
She might've been a demon, but there's no denying Sailor was vibrant and beautiful. I still can't get over how she looked at the black and white ball.
Of course, I never made it with Sailor because she was a demon, but it's okay to fantasize about her, right?
A pop star of infinite elegance... kneeling before me...
I'm just gonna say it. If that evening had gone well and I didn't know Sailor was a demon, we would've totally hooked up. Southern girls are freaky, right? Just imagine...
No, no, I can't be thinking of Sailor Pellegrino right now. Yeah, she was hot and smelled nice and her skin was soft...
I guess I never thought about it... but Mila was pretty much naked under her racing suite the entire time I was watching her. How did I not notice?
Mila was real impressed with life in Neo Yokio, so I bet she'd be blown away by a Neo Yokian lover...
Mila was... actually quite beautiful. I can picture her now. Hair black as a night sky. Ruby red lips. Eyes full of... contempt for the free market...
Too bad Mila stripped for that fisherman to escape and not me. I hope she's still crazy, wherever she went off to.
Wait... so Mila was naked in that racing suite, and then Helena was practically naked in it, and then I wore it... is that gross or kinda hot? I can't seem to keep that straight right now.
Hoo... I'm getting... close...
Ah, damn... I don't think I can...
Hanging on... by a thread. It's powerful...
Just a bit more... it'll feel so good.
My spine is all tingly. Anybody else feel that?
That's the stuff...
Aaaah... damn...
Yeah... well, if I said anything in the heat of the moment, that all stays here, okay? Great...
When I get back, I'm going to get Charles to make me some cocoa and chicken soup. I'll catch a cold standing around like this.
Remember: vanity is one of the healthiest things in the world. This is, above all, a game about vanity.
Okay, so obviously I have some unresolved romantic issues. That's hardly news to me, I guess.
Endorphins flowing, no need to worry about playing anymore. Life is good.
There must be some place like this in Neo Yokio. I mean, if the Tiger Bar exists surely this wouldn't be all that weird comparatively.
Ah, mental clarity. The one downside to release...
Guess I didn't consider how long this whole thing might actually take.
Of course, no Charles here. Just when I need him too.
I am a bit curious to see how this whole thing plays out. Morbidly curious.
Maybe this game is best played with strangers. In my experience, playing a game this raunchy with friends really makes casual conversation awkward for a little while.
All in a day's work for Kaz Kaan! It's nothing a gentleman of my caliber couldn't do!
Congratulations, ~player~! It's not much, but I got you a giant Toblerone!
Well, that was embarrassing. Whether it was luck or skill, you're the most elegant one here today.
